text: Helma Sanders-Brahms (20 November 1940 – 27 May 2014) was a German movie director, screenwriter, producer and actress. She was known for directing Germany, Pale Mother. Sanders-Brahms was born in Emden. She died in Berlin on May 27, 2014 after a long illness, aged 73.stern.de – Filmemacherin Helma Sanders-Brahms gestorben ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Lower Saxony Category:Disease-related deaths in Germany Category:German movie actors Category:German movie directors Category:German movie producers Category:German screenwriters Category:People from Emden
title: Helma Sanders-Brahms
